article.headline: Jacksonville 85, Coastal Carolina 72
article.story: JACKSONVILLE, Fla. (AP) -- Marcus Allen posted season highs of 22 points and 13 rebounds to power Jacksonville to an 85-72 win over Coastal Carolina on Sunday night. Allen connected on 10-of-16 shots from the floor to become Jacksonville's first player to top 20 points and grab at least 10 rebounds in a game this season. He scored 17 points in the first half in leading Jacksonville (4-5) to a 38-30 lead at the intermission. Jacksonville held a 14-point advantage at 65-51 with 6 minutes left in the game when Coastal Carolina (3-3) scored eight consecutive points in just over a minute to trim the deficit to six points. Jacksonville responded by converting seven of eight free throws in the next two minutes while holding the Chanticleers scoreless to hike their margin back to 13. They led by at least nine points the rest of the game. Jacksonville had eight blocked shots in the game and held a 38-27 rebound margin, but committed a season-high 23 turnovers. The Dolphins shot 55 percent from the floor and 81 percent from the foul line, the first time this year that they reached the 50 percent mark from the field. Lehmon Colbert scored 16 points for Jacksonville as the Dolphins had five players in double figures for the game. Moses Sonko led four Coastal Carolina players in double figures with a season and career high 23 points. The Dolphins play Texas A&M on Saturday.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
